code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{TextField,Button,Card,CardContent,Typography}from"@mui/material";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CampaignForm=_ref=>{let{onAddCampaign}=_ref;const[formData,setFormData]=useState({campaignName:"",targetWallet:"",budget:"",message:""});const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!formData.campaignName||!formData.targetWallet||!formData.budget||!formData.message){alert("All fields are required!");return;}onAddCampaign(formData);setFormData({campaignName:"",targetWallet:"",budget:"",message:""});alert("Campaign Created Successfully!");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{style:{marginBottom:"20px",padding:"20px"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",gutterBottom:true,children:"Create a Campaign"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Campaign Name",name:"campaignName",value:formData.campaignName,onChange:handleChange,fullWidth:true,margin:"normal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Target Wallet",name:"targetWallet",value:formData.targetWallet,onChange:handleChange,fullWidth:true,margin:"normal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Budget (in Crypto)",name:"budget",value:formData.budget,onChange:handleChange,type:"number",fullWidth:true,margin:"normal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Message",name:"message",value:formData.message,onChange:handleChange,fullWidth:true,multiline:true,rows:4,margin:"normal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"contained",color:"primary",fullWidth:true,children:"Create Campaign"})]})]})});};export default CampaignForm;
